header.title: Liber Evolution By Mammon Through Rev. Frederick Nagash

central_thesis: This text posits a unique Luciferian cosmology where Lucifer initiated humanity's creation. It argues that human evolution, both physical and spiritual, is incomplete and currently stalled by 'forced evolution.' True evolution is an ongoing, natural process of 'education' involving reaching one's 'Carnal selves' and ultimately achieving the 'Asar-Un-Nefer' state—a merging of 'true' will and divine self into a 'godform'—which is declared as 'The Great Work' for a select group of 'choosen ones' destined for sovereignty and divine proclamation.

structure_content.summary: The origin of man and the process of evolution are asserted to lack defined truths.
Both religious claims of divine creation and scientific claims of animalistic origin for humanity are deemed correct, suggesting a syncretic understanding.

Citing 'Liber Revealing book 2 verse 8,' the text states Lucifer asked a god to create 'peoples' to display grace and beauty, thus implying Lucifer's foundational role in human creation before humanity fully became 'man'.
The scientific proof of man evolving from animals is affirmed.

Human evolution is described as ongoing but incomplete and currently at a standstill. True evolution is equated with 'education' and requires reaching one's 'Carnal selves' on a 'natural basis' to resume.
It is argued that 'forced evolution' has led to humanity's spiritual slumber and caused humans to 'un-evolve'.
To achieve Asar-Un-Nefer, individuals must 'revert to our previous self' to enable the continuation of authentic evolution.

structure_content.chapter_title: Definition of Asar-Un-Nefer and The Great Work
structure_content.summary: Asar-Un-Nefer is defined as the merging of one's 'true' will and divine self on the physical plane, leading to the state of 'one mind or godform.' This endeavor is explicitly designated as 'The Great Work'.
Man in his divine form will rise and universally declare 'My will be done,' demanding all to listen.

A distinction is made between 'the choosen ones,' who will manifest glory and command respect, and 'the weak ones,' who are associated with 'the blood of the false prophet and of lies' and will be outcast.
The adherents of this evolution must stand strong together to prevent 'the weak' from perverting their path.

key_concepts.definition: A multi-faceted process encompassing physical, spiritual, and conscious development. The text asserts that current human evolution is stalled by 'forced evolution' and can only proceed naturally through 'education' and the realization of 'Carnal selves'.

The ultimate state of being, achieved by merging one's 'true' will and divine self on the physical plane to become 'the one mind or godform.' It represents self-deification and the culmination of true evolution.
The conscious, dedicated, and transformative process of achieving the Asar-Un-Nefer state, linking this system to traditional alchemical and Hermetic concepts of spiritual actualization.
The cosmological premise that Lucifer played a primary role in the creation of 'peoples' or early humanity, predating the full development of 'man,' as referenced in 'Liber Revealing book 2 verse 8'.

A foundational aspect of the human being that must be realized on a 'natural basis' for genuine evolution to restart. This implies an essential, possibly primal or instinctual, self that needs integration or activation.
The regressive spiritual state caused by 'forced evolution,' characterized by 'humanities spiritual slumber,' contrasting with true, natural evolution.

A select group of individuals destined to fully embody and propagate this evolutionary path, achieving glory and spiritual dominion, distinct from 'the weak' who are associated with falsehood and will be rejected.

practical_system.description: The system described outlines a philosophical and evolutionary path focused on attaining the Asar-Un-Nefer state. This 'Great Work' involves consciously 'reverting to our previous self' to re-activate a natural, authentic evolutionary trajectory, which is currently stalled. The core operative principle is the merging of one's 'true' will and divine self to become a 'godform' on the physical plane. While explicit rituals are absent from this summary, the process implies rigorous internal work, self-inquiry, and a profound dedication to self-transformation and actualization of one's divine potential, potentially involving group cohesion among 'the choosen ones' to defend their path.

relevant_quotes.text: Lucifer ask god “For a peoples to show thy grace and his beauty - Liber Revealing book 2 verse 8” so in fact Lucifer created man however we were not man yet.

Our evolution is on going and is by far not complete. Until we reach our Carnal selves on a natural basis the process of evolution is at a stand still and what we believe is evolution has really been education.
Forced evolution has actually lead to humanities spiritual slumber humanity is in and in doing so has caused humans to un-evolve.
If we are to achieve Asar-Un-Nefer we must allow ourselves to revert to our previous self so that evolution can continue what has begun.

Asar-Un-Nefer is to allow mans “true” will and divine self to merge on the physical plane of existence and become the one mind or godform. To even attempt this, is and should be considered "The Great Work".
And man in his divine form will rise up from the ashes and profess to all “My will be done” and all shall listen.

critical_analysis.relevance: This text is highly relevant for its syncretic integration of scientific evolutionary theory with a distinctly Luciferian occult cosmology. It offers an antinomian perspective on human origins and spiritual destiny, positioning Lucifer as a benevolent creator figure and advocating for a radical form of self-deification through the Asar-Un-Nefer state. The concept of 'forced evolution' causing 'un-evolution' provides a critical lens on conventional spiritual paths, while 'The Great Work' is redefined within this unique framework. It contributes to esoteric discourse by presenting a challenging, elitist, and empowering path for those seeking a profound, individualized spiritual transformation and sovereignty.
critical_analysis.target_audience: The target audience includes practitioners of Luciferian currents, advanced esotericists, occultists interested in alternative evolutionary theories, and those drawn to systems of self-deification, particularly within Thelemic or Chaos Magick contexts, where the concept of the 'godform' and 'true will' are central. It would appeal to individuals seeking a spiritual path that prioritizes individual sovereignty, internal transformation, and a rejection of perceived societal or spiritual stagnation, especially those who align with an 'elect' or 'chosen' self-identity.
